title: TTT JSON Schema, v1.3
description: A person identified in a Traces Through Time dataset

DateEnd.description: end of dates covering age identification

DateStart.description: start of date(s) covering age identification

HasParticle.description: alias has nobiliary or other descriptive/prepositional particles

Campaign.description: military campaign in which an individual award was won

Place.description: location where an individual award was won

Score.description: confidence weighting for the relationship assertion

DateEnd.description: end of involvement of event with place

DateStart.description: start of involvement of event with place

Precedence.description: sequence of involvement of event with place

Certain.description: certainty of person's possession of a family name

DateEnd.description: end of person's possession of a family name

DateStart.description: start of person's possession of a family name

Order.description: formal order of person's multiple family names

Precedence.description: chronological sequence of person's possession of different family names

Preference.description: preference of person's usage of a family name

Type.description: type of person's family name alias

Certain.description: certainty of person's possession of a forename

DateEnd.description: end of person's possession of a forename

DateStart.description: start of person's possession of a forename

Order.description: formal order of person's multiple forenames

Precedence.description: chronological sequence of person's possession of different forenames

Preference.description: preference of person's usage of a forename

DateEnd.description: end of possession of a nationality

DateStart.description: start of possession of a nationality

Precedence.description: sequence of possession of a nationality

HasOrigin.description: person has a place of origin or birth

Certain.description: certainty of identification of place of origin or birth

DateEnd.description: end of dates at place of origin or birth

DateStart.description: start of date(s) at place of origin or birth

DateEnd.description: end of dates having this parent

DateStart.description: start of date(s) having this parent

Score.description: confidence weighting for the relationship assertion

HasPlace.description: person has association with a place

Certain.description: certainty of association with the place

DateEnd.description: end of association with the place

DateStart.description: start of association with the place

Type.description: nature of association with the place

HasPlace.description: place wholly or partially contains another place

IsWithin.description: place is wholly or partially contained by another place

Certain.description: certainty of possession of reference number

DateEnd.description: end of possession of reference number

DateStart.description: start of possession of reference number

Genre.description: genre of reference number of person

Name.description: name of reference number of person

Type.description: type of reference number of person

Certain.description: certainty of having this non-immediate family relation

DateEnd.description: end of dates having this non-immediate family relation

DateStart.description: start of date(s) having this non-immediate family relation

Name.description: name of relationship to this non-immediate family relation

Score.description: confidence weighting for the relationship assertion

Type.description: type of relationship to this non-immediate family relation

HasRole.description: person has role(s) in or regarding something

Certain.description: certainty of involvement with the role

DateEnd.description: end of involvement with the role

DateStart.description: start of involvement with the role

Name.description: description or nature of the role

Precedence.description: sequence of involvement with the role
relative order of siblings where -1 etc. is younger and +1 etc. is older

Score.description: confidence weighting for the relationship assertion
confidence weighting for the relationship assertion

InContainer.description: Data and context in which person is found

Context.description: immediate context in which person is found

Name.description: immediate sentence, cell or 50 chars either side

InContainer.description: Document in which person is found

Document.description: parent data structure in which person is found (eg. webpage or spreadsheet) or a smaller, discrete unit within such a data structure (eg. paragraph or row)

Filepath.description: local file system path to any file that is the origin of the source data

Quality.description: indication of the quality and/or reliability of the source data

Type.description: format of the container data structure

URL.description: container webpage (or sub-section thereof if identified by a '#' fragment identifier)

HeldBy.description: repository or institution which now curates the original document or dataset

InContainer.description: Document or Source in which person is found

Source.description: the wider document container (eg. website or folder)

Quality.description: indication of the quality and/or reliability of the source data

HeldBy.description: repository or institution which now curates the catalogue, dataset, website etc

IsAlive.description: a single 'floruit' date for a person inferred from the data

IsEndAlive.description: end of 'floruit' date range for a person inferred from the data

Certain.description: certainty of end of 'floruit' date range

IsStartAlive.description: start of 'floruit' date range for a person inferred from the data

Certain.description: certainty of start of 'floruit' date range

IsDead.description: deceased status for a person inferred from the data

SameAs.description: probability that another person might be the same as this person

Genre.description: how the 'same as' assertion was derived

Id.description: id of the relevant batch or result set stored in an auditing database, eg. MongoDB

Timestamp.description: date/time the 'same as' assertion was made

Type.description: algorithmic methods employed in the 'same as' assertion
